channel.title: oshiage on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in oshiage on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Tracks and Skytree
item.description: The Skytree watches over vast tracts of Tokyo, much of which still has an older, smaller, more patinated atmosphere. Areas around train tracks especially have that feel. Looking across the Tobu-Kameido Line here in Oshiage is one such place. Though only taken a year or so back the red building opposite is now gone, soon to replaced with who knows what. That is another constant in Tokyo: Change.
